thread.title: BRIEF-Golden Star Qtrly Earnings Per Share $0.03

title: BRIEF-Golden Star Qtrly Earnings Per Share $0.03
text:
Feb 20 (Reuters) - Golden Star Resources Ltd:
* GOLDEN STAR REPORTS FOURTH QUARTER AND FULL YEAR 2017 RESULTS
* GOLDEN STAR RESOURCES SEES 2018 CONSOLIDATED GOLD PRODUCTION 230,000 OUNCES - 255,000 OUNCES
* GOLDEN STAR RESOURCES SAYS 34% INCREASE IN CONSOLIDATED GOLD PRODUCTION IN Q4 OF 2017 TO 71,769 OUNCES
* 16% DECREASE IN AISC PER OUNCE IN Q4 OF 2017 TO $1,002 * SEES 2018 AISC PER OUNCE $850-$950
* SEES 2018 TOTAL CAPITAL EXPENDITURES $36.5 MILLION * QTRLY EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.03 * Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.03 -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
